extension.description:
OneWeb is a lightweight responsive,'mobile first' HTML5 boilerplate template created by Seth Warburton from Internet Inspired!.

It incorporates, and was inspired by, the hard work of others, notably

  • Mobile first thinking and sexy typographic basics from 320 and up by Andy Clarke
  • Assorted Joomla! tricks from Matt Thomas' Construct Framework

field.name: loadMoo
field.label: Load MooTools?
field.description: Load the MooTools JavaScript library that is included with Joomla? If it is not in use you can save a lot of Kb by not loading it. Setting this to no will also disable caption.js

field.name: jQuery
field.label: Load jQuery?
field.description: Load the latest, minified, version of jQuery (1.7.2) from Google?

field.name: modernizr
field.label: Load Modernizr?
field.description: Modernizr is an awesome feature detection library. See http://modernizr.com/ for details

field.name: badBrowser
field.label: Support bad browsers?
field.description: Enabling this will load some additional JS to add media query support and CSS3 psuedo selectors to browsers that don't natively support them (IE8 and below)

field.name: scripts
field.label: Load custom scripts?
field.description: Load the files scripts.js and plugins.js from the /js folder? If you want to add scripts place them in these files and then load them here, rather than using inidividual files

field.name: frontpage
field.label: Hide frontpage component?
field.description: Hide the main content area on the front-page?

field.name: setGeneratorTag
field.default: Internet Inspired! - Creative Joomla! templates - http://internet-inspired.com
field.label: Generator Meta Tag
field.description: Customise the generator meta tag output by your template.

field.name: verification
field.label: Google verification meta
field.description: Change Content_string_Google_gives_you to the meta content value Google gave in their code. You only need the content value, not the complete code

field.name: analytics
field.label: Google Analytics ID
field.description: Change UA-XXXXX-X to be your site's ID

field.name: googleWebFonts
field.default: copy the css link from Google here
field.label: Google Web Fonts collection
field.description: Paste in the link to the Google Web fonts collection that you want to be available to use in style.css. Visit http://code.google.com/webfonts, build a collection and then copy the link here
